heading: FAQ
intro: Here are some good-to-know things, to help you prepare for our special day.
body: We hope this information is helpful, but if you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to reach out. We're looking forward to celebrating with you!

faq.question: When and where is the wedding?
faq.answer: The wedding will take place on [Date] at [Venue Name], located at [Venue Address]. The ceremony will begin at [Time], followed by the reception.

faq.question: What is the dress code?
faq.answer: The dress code is semi-formal. We encourage guests to dress comfortably yet elegantly for the occasion.

faq.question: How do I RSVP?
faq.answer: You can RSVP by [Date] through our wedding website at [Website URL] or by contacting [Contact Person] at [Contact Information].

faq.question: Can I bring a plus one?
faq.answer: If your invitation includes a plus one, please include their name and food choice when you RSVP. If you’re unsure, please check with us.

faq.question: Are there accommodations nearby?
faq.answer: Yes, we have reserved a block of rooms at [Hotel Name], located at [Hotel Address]. Mention our wedding to receive a discounted rate. For more options, please visit our wedding website.

faq.question: How do I get to the venue?
faq.answer: Directions to the venue can be found on our wedding website under the 'Directions' section. Parking is available on-site.

faq.question: What time should I arrive?
faq.answer: We recommend arriving at least 30 minutes before the ceremony begins to ensure you find your seat and settle in comfortably.

faq.question: Will there be a cocktail hour?
faq.answer: Yes, there will be a cocktail hour immediately following the ceremony. Drinks and light appetizers will be served.

faq.question: What type of food will be served?
faq.answer: We will be offering a variety of meal options, including vegetarian and gluten-free choices. Please specify any dietary restrictions when you RSVP.

faq.question: Is there a gift registry?
faq.answer: Yes, we are registered at [Store Names]. You can find our registry details on our wedding website under the 'Registry' section.

faq.question: Can I take photos during the ceremony?
faq.answer: We kindly request that guests refrain from taking photos during the ceremony. We have hired a professional photographer to capture these special moments. Feel free to take photos during the reception.

faq.question: Will there be dancing?
faq.answer: Yes, there will be a dance floor and DJ at the reception. We look forward to celebrating and dancing with you!

faq.question: Are children welcome?
faq.answer: While we love your little ones, we have decided to make our wedding an adult-only event. We appreciate your understanding.

faq.question: What if I have a question not answered here?
faq.answer: Please feel free to contact us at [Contact Information] or visit our wedding website for more information. We’re happy to help with any additional questions you may have.
